content: bobbling along aran tote design by celeste young finished size excluding strap 13 h x 11 w x 4 d materials approx 18 oz 1 100 yds worsted weight yarn model shown in caron one pound yarn #581 espresso 2 12 x 3 pieces of plastic canvas button approx 7/8 crochet hook size h/8 hook gauge 14 sts 16 row = 4 in single_crochet stitch abbreviations chain chain st stitch single_crochet single_crochet bobble yo draw up a loop in intended stitch four times yo and draw through nine loops on hook popcorn work 4 double_crochet in designated stitch drop hook from loop and insert into top of first double_crochet insert into dropped loop yo and pull through double fpdc yo draw up a loop around intended stitch yo and draw through two loops on hook twice yo and draw through three loops pattern front of tote row 1 chain 42 turn working into ridge side of chain single_crochet in second ridge from hook and in each ridge across 41 single_crochet row 2 chain 1 turn single_crochet in first single_crochet fpdc around next single_crochet **single_crochet in next three single_crochet double fpdc around next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet double fpdc around next single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet fpdc around next single_crochet ** single_crochet in next three single_crochet fpdc around next single_crochet twice repeat ** to ** once single_crochet in last single_crochet row 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet in first 12 sts bobble in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet bobble in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 11 single_crochet bobble in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet bobble in next single_crochet single_crochet in last 12 single_crochet row 4 chain 1 turn single_crochet
